questions.title: 强迫所有人赞同你主观的意见是不对的。
questions.answer: It's not right to require everyone agree with your subjective view byforce.

questions.title: 让他去工作是不对的，因为他还是未成年。
questions.answer: It's not right to ask him to go to work because of his minority.

questions.title: 找借口是推脱责任是不对的。
questions.answer: It is not right to make an excuse to shirk responsibility.

questions.title: 在考试中抄袭别人的答案是不对的。
questions.answer: It's not right to copy someone's answer in an examination.

questions.title: 露西伤心时，汤姆对她这么冷漠是不对的。

answer.en: It's not right for you to take a shortcut.
Maybe diligence is your better choice.

title: ——和你的婆婆在每件事上都斤斤计较是不对的。
——婆媳关系是一个复杂的问题。

answer.en: It's not right to haggle over every ounce for everything with yourmother-in-law.
The relationship between the mother-in-law and daughter-in-law is acomplicated problem.
It's not right to face the difficulty sheepishly.
